name: VR Dino Park Tour: Real Jurassic Experience
name_original: VR Dino Park Tour: Real Jurassic Experience
description:
The amazing Dino Jurassic experience has arrived on the Virtual Reality (VR). With VR Dion Park Tour: Real Jurassic Experience you can experience and explore the tremendous lost world dinosaur land by using VR glasses. Explore the dinosaur safari world and live with these dangerous predators and see how they hunt and attack one another. The numbers of deadly dangerous are living in this dark land. Just install this game and accomplish your dream to see the brutal war between dinosaurs. This is the best VR game to visit the dinosaur land. VR Dion Park Tour: Real Jurassic Experience trivia game of dinosaurs with full of thrill, adventure and action. This can amaze you because of its realistic graphics.
In VR Dion Park Tour: Real Jurassic Experience explore all the different dinosaur species: Apatosaurus, Pteranodon, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Velociraptor and many more. This is a fun family safari park dinosaur ride for all with unlimited excitement and thrill!
Features:
- Smooth & Easy VR Controls
- Splendid Dino Land Graphics.
- Realistic Sound Effects.
- Natural 3D Dino world environment.
- For IOS devices which have Gyro Sensor.
- HD game visuals.
- Full of entertainment.
